item.description:
Come and see what you missed at our inaugural games night!

We'll be playing board games at Empire Tea and Coffee on Broadway on Thursday the 28th. What will we be playing? I've got no idea. Come and see to find out!

It's all low-key and a great way to meet new people "on the island".

Have any questions? Send me a message. Have a game you think we'd like? Bring it along!

In your RSVP, please tell us whether you'd like to meet at Sapo Freaky Burrito beforehand (it's just a feet down the road). If there's interest, I'll add it to the agenda.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the guys in the back. Also, try my cell: (401) 699-7304
item.name: Board Games @ Empire
